title: Define Project Scope and Goals
description: Clearly define the scope of the project, its goals, and objectives in terms of market trends analysis and price prediction.

title: Market Trends Data Collection Strategy
description: Develop a strategy for collecting relevant market trends data that will be used to analyze the real estate market.

title: Price Fluctuation Prediction Algorithm Design
description: Design an algorithm for predicting price fluctuations based on the collected data and machine learning techniques.

title: Frontend Development: User Interface Design
description: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the tool, enabling users to easily access its features.

title: Backend Development: Integration of Data Collection and Prediction Modules
description: Develop the backend for integrating the data collection strategy, market trends analysis, and price prediction algorithms.

title: Database Management: Data Storage and Retrieval Strategy
description: Develop a database management strategy for efficient data storage, retrieval, and analysis.

title: DevOps: Infrastructure Setup and Deployment
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure for deploying the tool, ensuring scalability and high availability.
dependencies: Backend Development: Integration of Data Collection and Prediction Modules

title: Quality Assurance: Testing and Bug Fixes
description: Perform testing on the tool to ensure it functions correctly, fixing any identified bugs along the way.
dependencies: Backend Development: Integration of Data Collection and Prediction Modules

title: Security Review: Secure the Tool against Threats
description: Review the tool for any potential security vulnerabilities, ensuring it is protected against malicious actors.
dependencies: Backend Development: Integration of Data Collection and Prediction Modules

title: Documentation: Technical Writing for the Tool
description: Write clear and concise documentation detailing the tool's usage, setup, maintenance, and integration with the UI design and prediction modules. Provide examples and use-cases where appropriate.
dependencies: Backend Development: Integration of Data Collection and Prediction Modules
